channel.title: R on Notes about DataScience
channel.description: Recent content in R on Notes about DataScience

item.title: Analysis of conversion
item.description: Consider a typical task for the data analytics: some Internet portal for the sale of used cars decided to increase the conversion by changing the style and attractiveness of some user interface elements. The color of the button ‘communicate with the seller’ is changed. After that, AB testing was carried out in which a group of users saw a button in the old style, and the group B - in the new.

item.title: Useful instruments
item.description: Before you start learning data science, you should understand that this science is closely related to statistics, data warehouses, decision systems, databases. In addition, you will need to acquire a statistical analysis environment. In my opinion, python and R are better suited for this. The choice of these tools does not limit you in any way. If you still think that you can carry out the analysis in the MS Excel - go for it.
